author: janne-tech
body:
### Summary of the new feature / enhancement

parameter for x64 or x86 for download installer

### Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

parameter for x64 or x86 for download installer

comments.author: 237dmitry
comments.body:
> parameter for x64 or x86 for download installer

Parameter where?
You can download any version using github api. For the latest releases (now 7.3.0-rc.1 and 7.2.7):
```powershell
$json = (iwr 'https://api.github.com/repos/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases').Content | ConvertFrom-Json
$json[0,1].assets | ? name -match 'win-x' | % browser_download_url
```

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @janne-tech are you referring to the `install-powershell.ps1` script in this repo?  That script was really originally intended for use in CI when PS7 wasn't there.

title: parameter for x64 or x86 for download installer
